key_risks: Intense competition from established players and emerging startups
Regulatory and legal risks, including a securities class action lawsuit
Dependence on third-party cloud infrastructure providers
controversies: Securities class action lawsuit filed in November 2021
Customer complaints about platform complexity and poor service
social_issues: Customer complaints about poor service and communication
governance_issues: Leadership transition with potential execution risks
Ongoing litigation and regulatory compliance challenges
